###Zadanie 3
```
1.5625*10^(-1) = 0.15625 = 0.00101 = 1.01 * 2^(-3) =
0 01100 0100000000
```

###Zadanie 4
```
3.984375 * 10^(-1) = 0.3984375 = 0.0110011 =
1.1001 * 2^(-2) =
0 01101 1001100000

3.4375 * 10^(-1) = 0.34375 = 0.01011 = 1.011 * 2^(-2) =
0 01101 0110000000

1.771 * 10^3 = 11011101011 = 1.1011101011 * 2^(10) =
0 11001 1011101011

  0 01101 1001100000
+ 0 01101 0110000000
  ------------------
  
```
